  • Method Details

    • backupFile

      public static @Nullable File backupFile(Path fileToBackup) throws IOException
      Creates a backup of the given file if it exists, otherwise returns with null.
      Returns:
      a File object representing the backup copy or null if no backup was created because the file to backup did not exist
      Throws:
      IOException

    • backupFile

      public static @Nullable File backupFile(Path fileToBackup, Path backupFolder) throws IOException
      Creates a backup of the given file if it exists, otherwise returns with null.
      Returns:
      a File object representing the backup copy or null if no backup was created because the file to backup did not exist
      Throws:
      IOException

    • createTempDirectory

      public static Path createTempDirectory(@Nullable Path parentDirectory, String prefix, String extension) throws IOException
      Creates a temp directory that will be automatically deleted on JVM exit.
      Parameters:
      parentDirectory - if null, then create in system temp directory
      Throws:
      IOException

    • forceDelete

      public static boolean forceDelete(Path fileOrDirectory) throws IOException
      Deletes the given file or directory. Directories are deleted recursively.
      Returns:
      true if deleted, false if didn't exist
      Throws:
      IOException
